scripts.test: pnpm --filter frontend test && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter shared lint
scripts.lint:type: pnpm --filter frontend lint:type && pnpm --filter backend lint:type && pnpm --filter shared lint:type
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter frontend format && pnpm --filter backend format && pnpm --filter shared format
scripts.format: biome format packages/backend packages/shared --write && prettier packages/frontend --write
scripts.format:check: biome format packages/backend packages/shared && prettier packages/frontend --check
